chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: This plug-in contains a raster layer definition for accessing raster data from TMS servers as specified by OSGeo. See the Specification. Although not an official OGC specification, the TMS is easy to understand and has the advantage of being very performing.
This plug-in does not support the entire TileMapService capabilities, it does support a single TileMap configuration, as such a TileMap represents a single Layer. The supported TMS version is 1.0.0.
